title: Ex-Intel Employee Hid 18,000 Sensitive Documents Prior to Leaving the Company

content.raw: Intel is pursuing legal action against a former software engineer who the company claims downloaded thousands of confidential files shortly after being fired in July. The incident highlights growing concerns about data security during workforce reductions and employee departures.
